GitMA API References#

The GitMA main classes represent instances that are used in the CATMA App. See the introduction, the documentation of the CatmaProject class and the documentation of the AnnotationCollection class for examples.

    • Examples
  • CatmaProject

      • Load a local CATMA project
      • Load a remote CATMA project
      • Plot a cooccurrence network for the annotations in your project
